trans_title: 野性落基山 第一季
introduction: Stretching almost 5000 km over international borders, reaching thousands of feet into the sky, splitting the continents -- The Rocky Mountains are more than just massive, they're monstrous. Wild Rockies takes you into some of the unique ecosystems across this sprawling mountain range, and introduces you to the animals that call them home. From wild horses in the desert-like Oka...
chinese_title: 野性落基山 第一季
